text: As Told by Ginger is an American animated preteen drama television series. It aired from October 25, 2000 to November 14, 2006. It focuses on a junior high school (later high school) girl named Ginger Foutley who, with her friends, tries to become more than a social geek. It was produced by Klasky Csupo (which also produced Rugrats).
